name: whalevault-circuits
description: ZK circuits for WhaleVault privacy pool

scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup build/withdraw.r1cs pot14_final.ptau build/withdraw_0000.zkey
scripts.export-vk: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/withdraw_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.export-solidity: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/withdraw_final.zkey build/Verifier.sol
scripts.prove: snarkjs groth16 prove build/withdraw_final.zkey build/witness.wtns build/proof.json build/public.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify build/verification_key.json build/public.json build/proof.json
scripts.all: npm run compile && npm run setup && npm run contribute && npm run export-vk
